text: Olympos (Greek: Όλυμπος) is the name of a Greek dairy products company based in Trikala, Thessalia. It was founded in 1965 by an agricultural cooperation in Larissa with the support of Agrotiki Bank. In 2000 the company changed ownership and its industrial base was transferred to Trikala. As of 2018, it holds the second place of sales on dairy products in the Greek market with exports to 34 countries.Όλυμπος: από τη χρεωκοπία στη κορυφή ==References== Category:Food and drink companies of Greece Category:Greek brands Category:Food and drink companies established in 1965 Category:Companies based in Trikala Category:Dairy products companies of Greece Category:Greek companies established in 1965
title: Olympos (company)
